== Lyrics ==
During the cutscene in [[A Single Harmony for an Irreplaceable Soul|''A Single Harmony for an Irreplaceable Soul'']], [[Hu Tao]] and [[Xinyan]] sing along as the soundtrack plays. The lyrics sung depend on the player's choice of the language of the game's [[Voice-Over|voiceover]]. However, the soundtrack featured in the album is instrumental and does not include any singing voice.

|-
|Openin' the path without a fright / Oh!
